QuestData.Title: The Warden's Pawn
QuestData.Description: Once those Reliquary honks got here, we panicked, and we all just started looting indiscriminately.$b$bA lot of bad archaeology happened that day.$b$bLuckily, Olga happened upon this small jade statue. We thought it to be a key of some sort, but can't figure out what it opens. Maybe you'll have some better luck with it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find a use for the Warden's Pawn within the Tomb of the Watchers in the Badlands.
QuestData.RewardText: <The statue clicks into place on the large stone slab.>
